name: Space Rumble
description:
Space Rumble is a local multiplayer astronaut combat in space. Armed with a gas gun that can also double as a jetpack, you must out-maneuver your enemies in the deadly craters of Mars. Use your gas gun to fly around obstacles, collect power ups, move hazards, and, ultimately, push your enemies to their doom.

I worked on hazards. player animations, level design, environmental effects and musi
